attributes.action: make Insurance Companies, once 3rd party guilt has been admitted, completely exonerate the Insured from the claim and take full responsibility for the debt
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Once an Insurance Company obtains Third Party admission for a Motoring Claim and gives the go ahead to the Insured for a repair to be carried out, the Insured should no longer be held in any way responsible and it should become solely the Insurance Company’s debt. 

As far as the Insured is concerned the claim should be closed as soon as the go ahead has been given.

If the Insurance Company then fails to be reimbursed by the Third Party or their Insurance Company it should not have any effect on the Insured’s No Claims Discount.

It is time for Insurance Companies to start taking the risk that they are contracted to take.
